scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: William Gerard Chapman writes to Lucy (Fitch) and concerns an interview with Mrs. Ford, editor of the children's page of the Chicago Daily News. TWIN series has been discontinued, but would be interested in future Perkins work. Mentions Mr. Balmer of the University Club. 1 p. PerkinsTL(carbon), 1924 May 2.
L. F. P. responds to W. G. C. to information about Mrs. Ford and the serials in the News. Also refers to Mr. Balmer. 2 p. ALS. 1924 May 31.
